job_purpose: Lead the development and execution of the GenAI strategy for Corporate Office, ensuring alignment with business objectives and enhancing operational efficiency through AI models and data solutions.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and deploy AI models and data solutions to enhance operational efficiency and data-driven insights
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify automation opportunities, improve reporting, and enhance decision-making
Oversee the design of an integrated AI delivery platform in collaboration with technology, cyber, and data teams
Engage with stakeholders to enhance program outcomes and drive continuous improvement
Ensure business benefits from cutting-edge technology solutions for improved operational excellence
required_qualifications: Hands-on experience in delivering technology, data, and AI solutions
Proficiency in GenAI models, NLP, LLMs, and AI tools/platforms (e.g., OpenAI, Microsoft Azure AI, AWS AI/ML, Google Vertex AI)
Strong knowledge of modern cloud platforms, infrastructure as code, automated data governance controls, and cyber security and risk management principles
Ability to deploy MLOps and AI model lifecycle management
Experience in Agile methodology and working in large complex data environments
Naturally inquisitive and analytical mind with strong problem-solving abilities
Strong stakeholder engagement and influencing skills
Passion for learning and developing new skills
company_details: Wesfarmers is one of Australia's largest listed companies, known for reinventing itself and investing in leading retailers like Bunnings, Kmart, Target, Officeworks, and Priceline. The Corporate Office provides support and advice across the Wesfarmers Group, focusing on capital allocation, portfolio management, and leveraging the Group's reputation to attract talent and secure investment opportunities.
